name: Slots by GameHouse
description:
Play GameHouse Slots and enjoy Vegas-style Slot Machines with amazing graphics, fun mini games, huge jackpots, and the best payouts.

Spin the FREE Mega Wheel daily, and collect big payouts on our progressive Mega Star Jackpot. One spin of the Mega Star Jackpot and you can Win Millions of Coins!

Daily & Hourly Bonuses!
The more you play, the more FREE Bonuses you get. Spin the Mega Wheel daily for FREE Coins, and don't forget to collect the in-game Bonus Coins throughout your day.

Tons of Slot Machines!
Choose from 21 exciting Slot Machines with stunning HD graphics and spectacular Bonus Games. From Sure Luck Gnomes to Bad Kitty, our slots contain buckets of winning fun.

Expand the game by connecting with Facebook. Connect now to:

* Post your achievements
* Invite friends to play
* Send and receive gifts

And don't forget... FREE Bonus Coins & Spins Daily!

Win BIG today with GameHouse Slots!
